description: Track and split shared expenses across trips, events, and groups. Create groups, add expenses, and get optimized settlement suggestions that minimize cash transfers. Settle up quickly and keep everyone square.

capabilities.name: create_group
capabilities.description: Create a group and return {group_id, secret}.

capabilities.name: record_debt
capabilities.description:
Splitwise-style direct debt: 'debtor owes creditor amount'.
Implementation: store one expense paid by creditor, with participants=[debtor] for full amount.

capabilities.name: add_split
capabilities.description:
Equal split receipt. If include_payer=True, payer also owes a share (Splitwise default).
Example: payer='Owen', amount=60, participants=['Owen','Mrugank','David'] -> shares=$20 each.

capabilities.name: history
capabilities.description: Return recent raw entries for the group.

capabilities.name: balances
capabilities.description: Return minimal settlement transfers: [{from, to, amount}].

capabilities.name: quick_settle
capabilities.description:
Paste: 'owen owes mrugank 20, mrugank owes david 15, barath owes david 7, owen owes barath 14'
Returns minimal settlement without writing to DB.
